metadata.synopsis: Female Drow. Guard and Absolute cultist.

0.speaker: Zealot Rylveth
0.text: I swore myself to Lolth for years. But she never let me sack a city.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Looking forward to the fight to come

1.speaker: Zealot Rylveth
1.text: Show no mercy in the battles to come. The Absolute watches us all.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Relishing the battles to come

2.speaker: Zealot Rylveth
2.text: No feuding under this roof, True Soul. We're all one under the Absolute - more's the pity.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: Cocky but friendly - used to infighting and almost regretful that the cult is so unified

3.speaker: Zealot Rylveth
3.text: I'd stick to your own provisions. They've got gnolls working the kitchens here.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: One veteran to another
